page.title: 02Canterbury Planning (cont'd)
page.content:
To provide for{recreation}a new sports complex is to be built which will hopefully also encourage the many day trippers to stay overnight.
The future growth of car-borne visitors is to be provided for by the provision of new{car}parks and improvements to the new highway network.
Throughout the planning of Canterbury due regard is given to the need to protect historic buildings, historic features, and ensure that new development contributes to the quality of the{environment.}Special protection is provided for Canterbury conservation area and its Victorian suburbs.
